title: Understanding DSM-5
text: The DSM-5 is a critical tool used by healthcare professionals for diagnosing various mental health disorders, including Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD).

title: Components of DSM-5
text: The DSM-5 provides a comprehensive overview of symptoms and diagnostic criteria for mental health disorders.

hintAnswer: it includes a summary of symptoms and diagnostic criteria
title: Key Features of DSM-5
text: What does the DSM-5 include that is essential for diagnosing ASD?
choices: it includes a summary of symptoms and diagnostic criteria
it includes only a summary of symptoms
it is not useful for the diagnosis of ASD
